newsitem.title: USA: National Health sees continuing improvements.
newsitem.headline: National Health sees continuing improvements.

text.p: National Health Investors Inc said Wednesday it expects continuing improvements in the fourth quarter, after reporting third quarter net income rose to $16.9 million, up 25 percent from the year-ago figure.
The company said net income for the nine months ended September 30 rose 35 percent over the prior year to $48.9 million, or $2.07 per fully diluted share.
"We expect continuing improvements in the final quarter of 1996 as the investments and capital changes we have put in place during the last 12 months show results," the company stated.
